data.title: In Hebron, Young Palestinians Are Presumed Guilty Until Proven Innocent
data.meta_description: Two Palestinian Brothers Were Detained in the Dead of Night in Hebron After Local Kids Moved the Barbed Wire Blocking Their Street; They Were Abused by Soldiers for Hours.
